title: A Night with My Ex
resume: Ex-couples are brought together for one night in a multi-camera-rigged one-bedroom apartment, with no producers and no interruptions, to hash out their unresolved issues. Viewers witness startling confessions, wild hook ups, and shocking resolutions in a format where anything can – and does – happen.
